entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
